title: Foxconn: iPhone maker bets on electric truck firm Lordstown Motors
description: The Taiwanese technology giant says it will invest up to $170m in Ohio-based Lordstown Motors.

title: Complaint made against PimEyes search engine for faces
description: Privacy campaign group Big Brother Watch has asked the UK privacy watchdog to investigate PimEyes.

title: Why an old train could point to a clean energy future
description: Progress is being made on systems to make hydrogen more economical to store and transport.
